brand.name: Stock Tracker
brand.description: Track your investments with precision. Monitor your portfolio performance, analyze trends, and make informed decisions with our comprehensive stock tracking platform.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer:
disclaimer.text: This application is for educational and personal use only. Stock data may be delayed. Always verify information with official sources before making investment decisions.

content.commitmentText: At Stock Tracker, we believe in radical transparency. This privacy policy explains exactly what data we collect, how we use it, and most importantly - how you maintain complete control over your information.

portfolioData.title: Stock Portfolio Data
items: Stock symbols you track (e.g., AAPL, MSFT)
portfolioData.note: This is investment tracking data only. We do not store or have access to your actual brokerage accounts, bank information, or real financial assets.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.text: Your username and password are used solely to verify your identity and provide secure access to your personal portfolio data.

portfolioTracking.title: Portfolio Tracking
portfolioTracking.text: Your stock purchase data is used to calculate portfolio performance, generate charts, and provide investment insights within the application.

appFunctionality.title: Application Functionality
appFunctionality.text: We use your data to provide the core features of the application: dashboard views, profit/loss calculations, and historical tracking.

localStorage.title: Local Storage
localStorage.text: Your data is stored in a local SQLite database. We do not use cloud storage or third-party data services.

passwordSecurity.title: Password Security
passwordSecurity.text: Passwords are hashed using bcrypt with 12 rounds of salting. We cannot see or recover your original password.

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.text: Only you can access your portfolio data through your authenticated account. Data is isolated per user with no cross-user access.

dataSharing.noSharing: We DO NOT share your data. Period.
dataSharing.text: Your portfolio information is never sold, shared, or disclosed to third parties under any circumstances. No exceptions.

dataDeletion.title: Complete Data Deletion
dataDeletion.subtitle: Instant & Permanent Deletion
dataDeletion.text: Request complete account deletion and we will immediately remove ALL your data from our systems. No backup retention, no depersonalization, no gradual deletion - everything is permanently erased within 24 hours. This action cannot be undone.

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.text: You can export all your portfolio data in JSON format at any time through the application settings.

accountModification.title: Account Modification
accountModification.text: Change your username or password at any time through your account settings. Update or delete individual portfolio entries as needed.

content.questionsText: We're committed to transparency. If you have any questions about how we handle your data, please don't hesitate to reach out.
content.updatesText: If we update this privacy policy, we'll notify users through the application interface. The "Last updated" date at the top of this page will reflect any changes.

content.agreementText: By using Stock Tracker, you agree to these terms. We've written them in plain English to be as clear and fair as possible. These terms protect both you and us while you use our portfolio tracking service.

educationalTool.title: Educational Tool
educationalTool.text: Stock Tracker is a portfolio tracking application designed for educational and personal record-keeping purposes. It helps you monitor hypothetical or real stock purchases you've made.

notFinancialAdvice.title: Not Financial Advice
notFinancialAdvice.text: We provide tools and data visualization, but no investment advice, recommendations, or guarantees. All investment decisions are entirely your own responsibility.

dataTrackingOnly.title: Data Tracking Only
dataTrackingOnly.text: We only track the purchase data you manually enter. We don't connect to brokerage accounts, execute trades, or handle real money.

accountSecurity.title: Account Security
items: Don't share your account with others

accurateInformation.title: Accurate Information
items: Enter accurate purchase data for meaningful results
Verify stock symbols and prices before entry
Understand that calculations depend on your input quality

appropriateUse.title: Appropriate Use
items: Use the service for personal portfolio tracking only
Don't attempt to hack, abuse, or overload our systems
Don't use the service for illegal activities

noFinancialAdvice.title: No Financial Advice
noFinancialAdvice.text: Stock Tracker provides tools and data only. Nothing in this application constitutes financial, investment, trading, or other professional advice. Always consult qualified financial advisors before making investment decisions.

dataAccuracy.title: Data Accuracy
dataAccuracy.text: Stock price data may be delayed, inaccurate, or incomplete. Always verify information with official sources before making any financial decisions. We are not responsible for data errors or market data delays.

noGuarantees.title: No Guarantees
noGuarantees.text: We provide the service "as is" without warranties of any kind. We don't guarantee uptime, data accuracy, or that the service will meet your specific needs.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Updates
maintenance.text: We may temporarily suspend the service for maintenance, updates, or improvements. We'll try to minimize disruptions but can't guarantee 100% uptime.

featureChanges.title: Feature Changes
featureChanges.text: We may add, modify, or remove features to improve the service. We'll notify users of significant changes through the application.

yourRight.title: Your Right to Leave
yourRight.text: You can delete your account and all associated data at any time through the application settings or by contacting us. Deletion is immediate and permanent.

serviceTermination.title: Service Termination
serviceTermination.text: We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms or misuse the service. We'll provide reasonable notice when possible.

educationalPurpose.title: Educational Purpose
educationalPurpose.text: Stock Tracker is provided for educational and informational purposes only. We are not liable for any investment losses, missed opportunities, or financial decisions made based on information from our service.

maximumLiability.title: Maximum Liability
maximumLiability.text: Our total liability for any claims related to the service is limited to the amount you paid for the service (which is currently $0, as the service is free).

content.changesText: We may update these terms occasionally to reflect service changes or legal requirements. We'll notify users of significant changes through the application. Continued use after changes indicates acceptance of the new terms.
content.governingLawText: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where the service is operated. Any disputes will be resolved through good faith discussion or appropriate legal channels.
content.questionsText: If you have questions about these terms of service or need clarification on any point, please contact us.

acceptance.title: By using Stock Tracker, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms of service.
acceptance.subtitle: Thank you for being part of our community!

error.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
